title: You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again.
body:
I get this at the loading screen after champion select

Windows 7 Ultimate
64-bit
Intel HD Graphics

My firewall isn't blocking league, and neither is my antivirus

replies.body: It seems that your network is failing to establish a connection and leave you behind.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Make sure to go over each step listed there, and also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help configure some of these settings automatically.  Let me know if you have any questions!
